tip1.title: How To Use
tip1.article: Sausage Man is a Battle Royale shooter for Android where the characters are sausages, leading to comical situations but without losing sight of the action, The thirst for Battle Royale shooter games seems to be unquenchable and we see them in all kinds of formats, from serious as in PUBG

tip2.title: Landing Location
tip2.article: The first thing you need to pay attention to is the landing location. Each map in Sausage Man has its advantages and disadvantages, there are places with good loot that are targeted by many players, there are also quiet places which are usually located in the outermost area of the map. For beginners who are still confused about choosing a landing location, get off at a relatively safe location.

tip3.title: Game Looting
tip3.article: Looting is the first thing you should do after getting off the bus. Almost like other battle royale games, you go down without being equipped with anything and you have to find your own war equipment. This equipment can be in the form of weapons, armor, bags, scopes, helmets, or healing items scattered on the game map.

tip4.title: Weapon Selection
tip4.article: As explained above, of course you need a weapon. Sausage Man has a wide variety of weapons, each with its own advantages and disadvantages. There are many types of weapons that are powerful in close, medium, and long range. Pick a strategy, because when you choose the weapon to be used, of course you have to understand its use.

whatnew1.title: Sausage Man Feature
whatnew1.article: The game features explosive 100-player battles, a huge combat zone to compete in, and customizable Sausage combatants, Sausage Man is a battle royale game that lets you dominate rival Sausages in hilarious fashion with clever wits and outrageous tricks.
